articles.title: Russia Attacks Ukraine as New Audio Reveals Candidate Trump Told Putin He’d Bomb Moscow
articles.description: Russia launched a massive drone and missile attack on Kyiv, resulting in casualties and widespread damage. Concurrently, audio recordings surfaced of Donald Trump stating he threatened to bomb Moscow to deter Russian aggression.

articles.title: Supreme Court Won’t Allow Florida to Enforce Law Criminalizing Undocumented Immigrants
articles.description: The U.S. Supreme Court blocked Florida from enforcing a state law that criminalizes undocumented immigrants, upholding a lower court's decision that immigration enforcement is a federal matter.

articles.title: June Heat Wave Killed 2,300 People Across 12 European Cities
articles.description: A recent report revealed that a heat wave in June led to approximately 2,300 deaths across 12 European cities, with scientists attributing 1,500 of those deaths directly to the climate crisis.
